segments.text: Look at this headline , Soo Mi .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow ! So many people in the United States get divorced !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is it the same in Korea ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't think so . In Korea some marriages break up , but most couples stay together .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not really . Very few people get married beforethe age of 20 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hmm . Do women usually work after they get married ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , a lot of women stay home and take care of their families . But some work .
segments.speaker: S2
